entries.title: Ed Kelce Once Detailed Late Girlfriend's 1st Meeting With Taylor Swift
entries.content: One year before Ed Kelce’s girlfriend, Maureen Maguire, suddenly died at the age of 74, he gushed about her first interactions with Taylor Swift. Swift, 35, started dating Ed’s son Travis Kelce in summer 2023 and met his family the following fall at one of Travis’ Kansas City Chiefs football games. ...
